text: Alireza Akabarpour (, born May 10, 1973) is a former Iranian footballer and a current coach. ==Career== Akbarpour played as a striker for the Iranian football team Esteghlal F.C. for years.https://www.tasnimnews.com/fa/news/1392/10/24/248501/اکبرپور-استقلالی- ها-در-حمام-و-دستشویی-هم-سیگار-می-کشیدند-دربی-را-می-بریم Born in East Azarbaijan Province in 1973, he wore jersey number 16 for his team. ==Managerial career== He Started his career as football coach with Esteghlal F.C.(U'15) in December 2018.https://parsfootball.com/fa/614309/علیرضا-اکبرپور- سرمربی-نونهالان-استقل/http://www.football-tehran.com/samane/i-user/1018148233/ ==References== ==External links== * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian footballers Category:Iranian Azerbaijani sportspeople Category:Sportspeople from Tabriz Category:Esteghlal F.C. players Category:Machine Sazi F.C. players Category:Iran international footballers Category:Homa F.C. players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Alireza Akbarpour
